type_pay.description: Type of finance record like money, credit card, debit card, etc.

source_pay.description: Type of source like money, card 1, card 2, etc.

category.description: Category of the finance record like home, school, vehicle, etc.

due_date.description: Due date to finance record. Required to finance record of type output.

in_date.description: Input date of finance record. Required to finance record of type input.

post.summary: Create a new record of :type (input or output).
